channel.title: ITWD6.408 Paper: Advanced Web application development

item.title: Client-server model
item.description: This topic is all about client-server networking model. Client-side technologies and server-side technologies are introduced.

item.title: Web planning and design
item.description: How to plan well and website project and how to design a beautiful website? What is Mobile-first approach? Why website responsive and how to do?

item.title: XML
item.description: What is XML? What for? Will XML replace HTML? Should we use XML instead of database?
